languages.text:
"Догмат велит совершить последовательные ритуалы очищения и пересборки варп-секстанта. Этот ритуал долог и трудоемок".
{n}Паскаль колеблется, перед тем, как продолжить.{/n} "Наша надежда — в том, чтобы обойти священный запрет на взаимодействие с проводниками Движущей Силы. Более быстрый и менее ортодоксальный путь".

"Dogma bids that the appropriate rituals of cleansing and reassembly be carried out on the warp sextant. It is a long and labour-intensive process."
{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."
languages.original_text:
"Догмат велит совершить последовательные ритуалы очищения и пересборки варп-секстанта. Этот ритуал долог и трудоемок".
{n}Паскаль колеблется, перед тем, как продолжить.{/n} "Наша надежда — в том, чтобы обойти священный запрет на взаимодействие с проводниками Движущей Силы. Более быстрый и менее ортодоксальный путь".

{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

languages.text: “根据机械修会的教条，我们在重新组装亚空间六分仪时，需要执行恰当的清洁与重组仪式。这个过程非常漫长，需要大量劳力。”{n}帕斯卡犹豫了一下，继续说道。{/n}“我们最合适的办法是绕过神圣的教条，直接连接源力的线路。这种方式不太正统，但要更快。”
languages.original_text:
"Dogma bids that the appropriate rituals of cleansing and reassembly be carried out on the warp sextant. It is a long and labour-intensive process."
{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

traits.locale_text: “根据机械修会的教条，我们在重新组装亚空间六分仪时，需要执行恰当的清洁与重组仪式。这个过程非常漫长，需要大量劳力。”{n}帕斯卡犹豫了一下，继续说道。{/n}“我们最合适的办法是绕过神圣的教条，直接连接原初动力的线路。这种方式不太正统，但要更快。”

languages.text:
「ドグマは、ワープセクスタントで浄化と再組み立ての適切な儀式を行うよう命じています。これは長い時間と労力を要する作業です」
{n}パスカルは少し躊躇した後に言葉を続けた。{/n}「我々の最善のチャンスは、神聖な禁止事項を回避して、動力源の導管に直接干渉することです。より早く、より正統的でない方法です」
languages.original_text:
"Dogma bids that the appropriate rituals of cleansing and reassembly be carried out on the warp sextant. It is a long and labour-intensive process."
{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

{n}パスカルは少し躊躇した後に言葉を続けた。{/n}「我々の最善のチャンスは、神聖な禁止事項を回避して、動力源の導管に直接干渉することです。より早く、より正統的でない方法です」

languages.text:
"Das Dogma verlangt, dass die korrekten Rituale der Reinigung und der Neumontage an dem Warp-Sextanten durchgeführt werden. Das ist ein zeit- und arbeitsintensiver Prozess."
{n}Pasqal zögert und fährt dann fort:{/n} "Unsere beste Chance besteht darin, die heilige Prohibition des direkten Kontakts mit den Leitungen der Antriebskraft zu umgehen. Das ist schneller und weniger orthodox."
languages.original_text:
"Dogma bids that the appropriate rituals of cleansing and reassembly be carried out on the warp sextant. It is a long and labour-intensive process."
{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

traits.locale_text:
"Das Dogma verlangt, dass die korrekten Rituale der Reinigung und der Neumontage an dem Warp-Sextanten durchgeführt werden. Das ist ein zeit- und arbeitsintensiver Prozess."
{n}Pasqal zögert und fährt dann fort:{/n} "Unsere beste Chance besteht darin, die heilige Prohibition des direkten Kontakts mit den Leitungen der Antriebskraft zu umgehen. Das ist schneller und weniger orthodox."

languages.text: « Le dogme exige que les rituels appropriés de purification et de réassemblage soient conduits sur le sextant Warp. C'est un processus long et laborieux. »{n}Pasqal hésite avant de poursuivre :{/n} « Notre meilleure chance est de transgresser l'interdit sacré en agissant directement sur les vecteurs de la Force Motrice. Une voie plus rapide, mais moins orthodoxe. »
languages.original_text:
"Dogma bids that the appropriate rituals of cleansing and reassembly be carried out on the warp sextant. It is a long and labour-intensive process."
{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

traits.locale_text: « Le dogme exige que les rituels appropriés de purification et de réassemblage soient conduits sur le sextant Warp. C'est un processus long et laborieux. »{n}Pasqal hésite avant de poursuivre :{/n} « Notre meilleure chance est de transgresser l'interdit sacré en agissant directement sur les vecteurs de la Force Motrice. Une voie plus rapide, mais moins orthodoxe. »

languages.text:
«El dogma dicta que se realicen los rituales de purificación y reensamblaje en el sextante de la disformidad. Es un proceso largo y arduo».
{n}Pasqal titubea antes de continuar.{/n} «Nuestra mejor opción es sortear la prohibición sagrada sobre la interconexión con los conductos de la Fuerza Motriz. Es una ruta más rápida, aunque menos ortodoxa».
languages.original_text:
"Dogma bids that the appropriate rituals of cleansing and reassembly be carried out on the warp sextant. It is a long and labour-intensive process."
{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

{n}Pasqal titubea antes de continuar.{/n} «Nuestra mejor opción es sortear la prohibición sagrada sobre la interconexión con los conductos de la Fuerza Motriz. Es una ruta más rápida, aunque menos ortodoxa».

languages.text: "Dogmalar, arınma ve yeniden birleştirme ayinlerinin öteboyut sekstantı üzerinde en doğru şekilde gerçekleştirilmesi gerektiğini söyler. Uzun ve yoğun iş gücü gerektiren bir süreçtir." {n}Pasqal bir müddet tereddüt edip söze devam ediyor.{/n} "Devinim Gücü'nün hatlarıyla doğrudan etkileşime geçmemizi engelleyen kutsal yasağı delmek, elimizdeki en mantıklı seçim. Pek geleneksel olduğu söylenemez ama daha hızlı bir yöntem."
languages.original_text:
"Dogma bids that the appropriate rituals of cleansing and reassembly be carried out on the warp sextant. It is a long and labour-intensive process."
{n}Pasqal hesitates before continuing,{/n} "Our best chance is to bypass the sacred prohibition on directly interfacing with the conduits of the Motive Force. A faster and less orthodox route."

traits.locale_text:
"Dogmalar, arınma ve yeniden birleştirme ayinlerinin en doğru şekilde öteboyut sekstantı üzerinde gerçekleştirilmesi gerektiğini söyler. Uzun ve yoğun iş gücü gerektiren bir işlemdir."
{n}Pasqal devam etmeden önce tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Devinim Gücü'nün devreleriyle direkt olarak etkileşime geçmemizi engelleyen kutsal yasakları delmek, elimizdeki en mantıklı seçim. Daha hızlı ve daha az geleneksel bir yöntem."
